text: He imanavalaharu! Nihsandeha aneka dharmajnata ra upasakaharu yasta chan, jasale manisaharuko mala anucita rupama khanchan, ra allahako margabata rokdachan, ra jasale suna camdika khajana (ekatra) garirakhdachan. Ra allahako margama kharca gardainan, ta uniharula'i kastadayaka yatanako samacara purya'idinus
